course_title: Understand Korean Culture & History Through Field Trips
class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from June 25 - August 4, 2024. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: This course aims to understand Korea's 5000 year history and its culture by studying and visiting historic sites which represent each era and are scattered all over the Korean peninsular.
sections: Class Nbr: 1439, Section #: 900, Type: ABR, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: B. Choi, Status: Open
